Constants.Name: SiemensInsightsHubOSBarConnector.OSBarURL
Constants.Description:
URL of the Insights Hub OSBar.
For more details see here:

https://design.mindsphere.io/osbar/introduction.html#tab1anchor0

Constants.Name: SiemensInsightsHubSingleSignOn.AssetLinks
Constants.Description:
Generate your digital asset links file with Android Studio and paste the content here.

Hint: remove /r/n from the json file

Constants.Name: SiemensInsightsHubSingleSignOn.ClientId
Constants.Description: The clientId of your mobile app from the Developer Cockpit application registration

Constants.Name: SiemensInsightsHubSingleSignOn.ClientSecret
Constants.Description: The clientSecret of your mobile app from the Developer Cockpit application registration

Constants.Name: SiemensInsightsHubSingleSignOn.CockpitApplicationName
Constants.Description:
Name of the application used in the Developer Cockpit.

This is used for JWT validation process and is mapped to the "aud" claim.

Constants.Name: SiemensInsightsHubSingleSignOn.CockpitApplicationVersion
Constants.Description: Used to get application credentials, must be identical to the version in the Developer Cockpit.

Constants.Name: SiemensInsightsHubSingleSignOn.EnableLocalApiReverseProxy
Constants.Description: Required to use the Siemens Insights Hub Web Component Widgets

Constants.Name: SiemensInsightsHubSingleSignOn.HostTenant
Constants.Description:
Name of Tenant where application is hosted.
Name is used during retrieval of application credentials.

Constants.Name: SiemensInsightsHubSingleSignOn.PublicKeyURL
Constants.Description: Endpoint where to fetcht the public keys for token validation.

Constants.Name: SiemensInsightsHubSingleSignOn.Scheme
Constants.Description: Use the scheme from deep link configuration used in the "build native mobile app"

Constants.Name: SiemensInsightsHubSingleSignOn.UserEmail
Constants.Description:
Value is used for local development. Defaults to "max.musterman@email.com" in case no value provided.

Will be set as email of the current "Account".

Constants.Name: SiemensInsightsHubSingleSignOn.UserTenant
Constants.Description:
Name of the user tenant.
Name is used during retrieval of application credentials.
